body:
i did run it in Release mode.
The simple project is all here:
https://bitbucket.org/gedw99/md-mobile-x

here is the bash script that runs the ios project in Release mode:
https://bitbucket.org/gedw99/md-mobile-x/src/d54d709a2c9690a088a32df585589b7fcd0ad907/ios_test01/t-build.sh?at=master&fileviewer=file-view-default


As far as archiving it. I dont knwo how to do that from the bash.
But i have deployed this code to my IOS phone, so it does work.
